Basically, I threw together a set of shields with high crash tolerance and temp tolerance.

Not really much else to say about these, try and enjoy.

[DOWNLOAD](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/48481896/Plating.zip)
I think I speak for many others when I ask you: can they withstand a direct railgun blast without massively changing the ship\'s trajectory or causing the main ship to explode?
Have you shot it? Please tell me that you\'ve shot at it.

> 
> I think I speak for many others when I ask you: can they withstand a direct railgun blast without massively changing the ship\'s trajectory or causing the main ship to explode?

Depends on the ship. They do block railgun projectiles, but it\'s just physics that make the ship move. 

A Tim style ship wouldn\'t budge, but a small fighter might gain ~10m/s.

And yes, I\'ve shot at it.
